thread.title: Orlando Rincon
thread.title_full: PRO Civic.com reviewed by Orlando Rincon

author: Orlando Rincon
title: Orlando Rincon
text: Honestly, never had a bad experience with pro civic, however their choices in shipping products through ontrac should be reviewed. The 100% satisfaction and top service guarantee, seemed otherwise after this last order I made. I'm thankful for finally receiving my order , but feel the delivery could have gone smoother.
